parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: waypoint.1
parameters.description: Specifies two or more locations that define the route and that are in sequential order.

parameters.name: waypoint.3
parameters.description: Specifies two or more locations that define the route and that are in sequential order.

parameters.name: viaWaypoint.2
parameters.description: Specifies one or more locations that define intermediate points of a route between waypoints.

parameters.name: avoid
parameters.description: Specifies the road types to minimize or avoid when a route is created for the driving travel mode. if travelMode is not Driving, avoid is not required

parameters.name: distanceBeforeFirstTurn
parameters.description: Specifies the distance before the first turn is allowed in the route. if travelMode is Driving, distanceBeforeFirstTurn is required

parameters.name: heading
parameters.description: Desired camera heading in degrees, clockwise from north.

parameters.name: optimize
parameters.description: Specifies what parameters to use to optimize the route on the map.

parameters.name: optimizeWaypoints
parameters.description: Instructs the API to rearrange the route waypoints and reduce the route cost specified with the optimize parameter.

parameters.name: routeAttributes
parameters.description: Specify to include or exclude parts of the routes response.

parameters.name: routePathOutput
parameters.description: Specifies whether the response should include information about Point (latitude and longitude) values for the route’s path.

parameters.name: tolerances
parameters.description: Specifies a series of tolerance values. Each value produces a subset of points that approximates the route that is described by the full set of points. if routePathOutput is Points, tolerances is required.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The units to use for distance in the response.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: The timeType parameter identifies the desired transit time, such as arrival time or departure time. if travelMode is Transit, dateTime is required

parameters.name: timeType
parameters.description: Specifies how to interpret the date and transit time value that is specified by the dateTime parameter. if travelMode is Transit, timeType is required

parameters.name: maxSolutions
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of transit routes to return. if travelMode is Transit or Driving, maxSolutions is required

parameters.name: itineraryGroups
parameters.description: Specifies whether the response include information about itinerary groups (continuous itinerary items in same mode are usually grouped together).

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

get.description: Find a walking, driving or transit route by specifying the mode of travel.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: waypoint.1
parameters.description: Specifies two or more locations that define the route and that are in sequential order.

parameters.name: waypoint.3
parameters.description: Specifies two or more locations that define the route and that are in sequential order.

parameters.name: viaWaypoint.2
parameters.description: Specifies one or more locations that define intermediate points of a route between waypoints.

parameters.name: avoid
parameters.description: Specifies the road types to minimize or avoid when a route is created for the driving travel mode. if travelMode is not Driving, avoid is not required

parameters.name: distanceBeforeFirstTurn
parameters.description: Specifies the distance before the first turn is allowed in the route. if travelMode is Driving, distanceBeforeFirstTurn is required

parameters.name: heading
parameters.description: Desired camera heading in degrees, clockwise from north.

parameters.name: optimize
parameters.description: Specifies what parameters to use to optimize the route on the map.

parameters.name: optimizeWaypoints
parameters.description: Instructs the API to rearrange the route waypoints and reduce the route cost specified with the optimize parameter.

parameters.name: routeAttributes
parameters.description: Specify to include or exclude parts of the routes response.

parameters.name: routePathOutput
parameters.description: Specifies whether the response should include information about Point (latitude and longitude) values for the route’s path.

parameters.name: tolerances
parameters.description: Specifies a series of tolerance values. Each value produces a subset of points that approximates the route that is described by the full set of points. if routePathOutput is Points, tolerances is required.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The units to use for distance in the response.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: The timeType parameter identifies the desired transit time, such as arrival time or departure time. if travelMode is Transit, dateTime is required

parameters.name: timeType
parameters.description: Specifies how to interpret the date and transit time value that is specified by the dateTime parameter. if travelMode is Transit, timeType is required

parameters.name: maxSolutions
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of transit routes to return. if travelMode is Transit or Driving, maxSolutions is required

parameters.name: travelMode
parameters.description: The mode of travel for the route.

parameters.name: itineraryGroups
parameters.description: Specifies whether the response include information about itinerary groups (continuous itinerary items in same mode are usually grouped together).

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: waypoint.1
parameters.description: Specifies two or more locations that define the route and that are in sequential order.

parameters.name: waypoint.3
parameters.description: Specifies two or more locations that define the route and that are in sequential order.

parameters.name: viaWaypoint.2
parameters.description: Specifies one or more locations that define intermediate points of a route between waypoints.

parameters.name: avoid
parameters.description: Specifies the road types to minimize or avoid when a route is created for the driving travel mode. if travelMode is not Driving, avoid is not required

parameters.name: distanceBeforeFirstTurn
parameters.description: Specifies the distance before the first turn is allowed in the route. if travelMode is Driving, distanceBeforeFirstTurn is required

parameters.name: heading
parameters.description: Desired camera heading in degrees, clockwise from north.

parameters.name: optimize
parameters.description: Specifies what parameters to use to optimize the route on the map.

parameters.name: optimizeWaypoints
parameters.description: Instructs the API to rearrange the route waypoints and reduce the route cost specified with the optimize parameter.

parameters.name: routeAttributes
parameters.description: Specify to include or exclude parts of the routes response.

parameters.name: tolerances
parameters.description: Specifies a series of tolerance values. Each value produces a subset of points that approximates the route that is described by the full set of points. if routePathOutput is Points, tolerances is required.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The units to use for distance in the response.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: The timeType parameter identifies the desired transit time, such as arrival time or departure time. if travelMode is Transit, dateTime is required

parameters.name: dimensionUnit
parameters.description: The unit of measurement of width, height, length. Can be one of the following values

parameters.name: weightUnit
parameters.description: The unit of measurement of weight

parameters.name: vehicleHeight
parameters.description: The height of the vehicle in the specified dimension units

parameters.name: vehicleWidth
parameters.description: The width of the vehicle in the specified dimension units.

parameters.name: vehicleLength
parameters.description: The length of the vehicle in the specified dimension units.

parameters.name: vehicleWeight
parameters.description: The weight of the vehicle in the specified weight units.

parameters.name: vehicleAxles
parameters.description: The number of axles.

parameters.name: vehicleTrailers
parameters.description: The number of trailers.

parameters.name: vehicleSemi
parameters.description: Indicates if the truck is pulling a semi-trailer. Semi-trailer restrictions are mostly used in North America.

parameters.name: vehicleMaxGradient
parameters.description: The maximum gradient the vehicle can drive measured in degrees.

parameters.name: vehicleMinTurnRadius
parameters.description: The minimum required radius for the vehicle to turn in the specified dimension units.

parameters.name: vehicleAvoidCrossWind
parameters.description: Indicates if the vehicle shall avoid crosswinds.

parameters.name: vehicleAvoidGroundingRisk
parameters.description: Indicates if the route shall avoid the risk of grounding.

parameters.name: vehicleHazardousMaterials
parameters.description: A comma separated and case-sensitive list of one or more hazardous materials for which the vehicle is transporting.

parameters.name: vehicleHazardousPermits
parameters.description: A comma separated and case-sensitive list of one or more hazardous materials for which the vehicle has a permit.

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

get.description: Find routes from major roads in four directions (West, North, East, South).

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Specifies the final location for all the routes.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specifies to return only starting points for each major route in the response.

parameters.name: routeAttributes
parameters.description: Specify to include or exclude parts of the routes response.

parameters.name: routePathOutput
parameters.description: Specifies whether the response should include information about Point (latitude and longitude) values for each route’s path.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The units to use for distance in the response.

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specifies the final location for all the routes.

parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specifies the final location for all the routes.

parameters.name: body

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specifies the final location for all the routes.

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: waypoint
parameters.description: The point around which the isochrone will be calculated.

parameters.name: maxTime
parameters.description: The maximum travel time in the specified time units in which the isochrone polygon is generated. Either maxDistance and maxTime is required, not both.

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: The units in which the maxTime value is specified.

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: The maximum travel distance in the specified distance units in which the isochrone polygon is generated. if travelMode is driving or walking, maxDistance is required

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The units in which the maxDistance value is specified.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: if travelMode is not driving or transit, dateTime is not required

parameters.name: optimize
parameters.description: Specifies what parameters to use to optimize the isochrone route

parameters.name: travelMode
parameters.description: Indicates the which routing profile to snap the points to.

parameters.name: waypoint
parameters.description: The point around which the isochrone will be calculated.

parameters.name: maxTime
parameters.description: The maximum travel time in the specified time units in which the isochrone polygon is generated. if optimize is Time or TimeWithTraffic, maxTime is required. Either maxDistance and maxTime is required, not both.

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: The units in which the maxTime value is specified.

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: The maximum travel distance in the specified distance units in which the isochrone polygon is generated. if travelMode is driving or walking, maxDistance is required

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The units in which the maxDistance value is specified.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A comma separated list of type IDs.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: The timeType parameter identifies the desired transit time, such as arrival time or departure time. if travelMode is driving, dateTime is required

parameters.name: optimize
parameters.description: Specifies what parameters to use to optimize the route on the map.

parameters.name: travelMode
parameters.description: The mode of travel for the route.
